choices: Cole: "I refuse to harbor evil like you!"
1.content:
"So come on baby, how about we go out for some coffee and maybe catch a movie later on? I'll pay of course." - Cole says charmingly


Nadia looks him over up and down. Cole, confident he'll get lucky, continues to bear a shit faced grin hoping the tall African model will say yes.


"Isn't it against company rules to hit on your customers Mister Lewis?" - Nadia says smugly


"Rachel's out on sick leave, so this place is a 'No Boss zone' at the moment. Hehe." - Cole


"Well then......." - Nadia stands and faces Cole


"No." - Nadia


Cole breathes in and smiles:


"Well can't hurt a guy for trying. Still, we'll cut the chitchat and I'll have your loan approved by tomorrow." - Cole smiles


"Be glad I've come here for years otherwise any other person would have slapped the shit out of you already." - Nadia


"One day Nadia, you'll fall into my loving embrace." - Cole clutches his fist dramatically


"Heh, you're cute, good luck with that. Thanks! I appreciate it though." - Nadia turns back and leaves the bank


Behind Cole's desk, Steven his coworker intrudes:


"You've been trying to hit on anything with breasts that walks in here for years. Be glad Rachel hasn't ordered the guillotine already for your head." - Steven


Cole gets up with things packed:


"Hey, I'm trying to provide a fun filled entertaining community in this stuffy old bank." - Cole


Cole starts walking out the door:


"So liven up a bit peeps. I'm heading out. See you drones later." - Cole


"COLE!" - Margaret yells


Cole turns and catches something in his hand

"You forgot your ring again!" - Margaret

"Ugh, not again. Thanks Mags. Appreciate it." - Cole

"Why do you still carry that old thing around for anyways?" - Margaret

"Superstition! and for good luck!" - Cole says and then takes his leave

"That guy's superstitious?" - both Steven and Margaret say at the same time

--------------------------------------------------------------------


The rain begins to let up as Cole walks down the street.

"Ugh, I hate public transportation." - Cole thinks to himself and then looks at the ring which is still held by his two fingers. The ring is gold all over and shaped as an Eagle's claw which is palming a small crystal inside of it.

"Can't lose this now either, now where's that bus......" - Cole stops as he's tripped up by the uneven sidewalk


The ring goes flying into the air and lands on the street during traffic.


"NOOOOO!" - Cole yells

He runs over, umbrella in hand and tries to spot his ring, but the rain pouring down on the light grey colored street makes it a bit difficult for him to see anything. Then looking over at the traffic and he waits for a lull to come. He then resumes his search and spots it in the middle of the street. It landed on the center divider lane and he spots it throughout the mucky rain drenched road.

"AHA! Ugh, damn it!" - Cole says annoyed. Looking over the road, he makes his break. The red light down the street signals everyone to stop and then Cole makes his move:

Leaping forward he runs out when few cars and few and away behind him and reaches out for the ring. In one motion, he grabs it and makes a dash to the end of the street with the sidewalk 5 or so seconds before a car comes close.

However, he trips on his shoe thanks to the weather and lands on the road on his chest. The visibility and bad wipers of the oncoming car makes it hard for her to see Cole out on the road.

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH!!!" - Cole screams trying to get up mere inches away from the car as it begins to swerve away but it's too late


============================================================================ ===============



Cole is frozen in time.


Eyes closed, he opens them to find himself standing out in the road.


"What in the?!" - Cole says looking around his surroundings. Everything is black and white and frozen in time, including the rain droplets. He waves a hand and brushes past the surrounding water droplets in midair.

"HUH?!" - Cole looks behind him onto the ground and jerks back

He stands in the center of a large glowing black and purple glyph shaped as a malformed skull. The dark energies surround him then he takes notice of his ring as the crystal inside it emminates some of that dark energy as well.....


".........cole......."



"HUH?! Who's there? What's going on?" - Cole


"I have saved you........"


Cole can only listen to the quiet but booming voice in his head.


"I can only communicate with you this once in times when the ring wearers are in great danger. Because I froze reality and slowed time to a millisecond, a contract to use my power of the ring has begun."


"Time is slowed here? Wait contract?! What kind of artifact is this?! Something evil?!" - Cole

"Your ancestors used the dark arts to manipulate phenomenon. An extremely dangerous art in order to prevent wars, disease and other unfortunate circumstances. These dark arts were shunned upon because perfecting them and the crystals in the ring would take centuries to fully become usable. Now that you've triggered it's power, the power to alter reality is finally perfected and now rests in your hands. In order to keep my power from waning, increased use of my power must be regularly used. However whether you use this for good or evil is up to you, but be aware of the consequences should this fall into the wrong hands. I only act as a mediary and I have no conscience, only the user does.

Along with my power to bend reality, you are given a secondary ability to slow down time exactly where you are now, In this limbo. People here have slowed to 1/1000 the accentuated speed, and because you are in this state, you can not die, be starved for food, needing to dispel wastes or age. You can freely travel anywhere you want, and then return everything to normal using the ring. Insert your finger and concentrate to what kind of alteration you want and it will happen. You can also teleport anywhere this way by thinking of the location as long as you have a clear picture of what the location looks like.

I must dispel from you, I must have your vow. Will you accept the contract and continue use of my abilities. Granted you know what should happen should you decline. "


"Huh?" - Cole says confused


"What is........ your........ answer?!"
1.title: Saved

choices: Try to know what Jade thinks about him
11.content:
==================================================

"Looks like I don't have much of a choice. Still this could prove interesting. Heh. I accept!" - Cole


"The contract has been mad........"


=========================================================


"Huh?!" - Cole awakens from his trance and takes notice of his surroundings.

He's standing on the sidewalk and NOT on the street as he was. Also the car that was to hit him passes by in complete control. Also the small group of people who watched Cole jump into the street seem to go about their own business including the people beside Cole walking past him as if nothing happened.


Cole looks down and notices the ring is on his finger.


"It's like it never happened." - Cole thinks to himself.


---------


Continuing his walk to his bus stop, the rain begins to pour fiercely this time, annoying Cole.


"Alter reality huh? If that really was real, then I should do something about this storm." - Cole thinks to himself. Having nothing to lose he sticks a finger into the small hole of his ring and concentrates.

=Make this storm end already= - Cole proclaims


Like a quick flash of light, Cole blinks and notices that the rain above begins to dissipate and clear. No even one minute later, the skies begins to clear away into bright blue skies. The people beside Cole take notice and do a small cheer that the rain ended.


"Well well now." - Cole smiles then folds his umbrella and runs to a section of the city where it's less populated. Turning a corner, he plants his finger into the ring and focuses on his LA apartment.


Like a flash, Cole blinks then finds himself two feet next to his own apartment door.


"Ugh, I got to get used to the flash, but this is AMAZING!!!" - Cole grins then unlocks his door and enters.


Cole enters, removes his coat and umbrella and shoes and enters the living room and plops down onto the couch. With a continued grin of his new power he raises an arm high to look at the ring.


"You're early to come home." - came a voice from the corner


Sitting in the corner was Cole's little sister Jade. She's the total definition when it comes to 'Goth'. Cole assumes it's just a phase in her life. She's fifteen, very intelligent and mature for her age. Somewhat short, decent figure, average bust size, long straight black hair dyed in blue green streaks, heavy makeup around her eyes, dark blue green lipstick. She wears a black and violet dress/corset with gold embroidery, black and white striped long stockings, black and white striped sleeves, dark violet painted fingernails, no piercings except her earrings on her left ear.

Jade was sitting in the corner barefoot with her striped stocking, caressing Cole's small black kitty Pepper and brushing her fur. Jade is pretty attached to Pepper.


"So tell me, did you finally get lucky today? I can easily read that happy grin of your face." - Jade


"Oh yeah, you could say that." - Cole says


"I can't believe you finally got suckered some poor girl into liking you!" - Jade smirks while brushing Pepper


"Huh?!" - Cole turns to her confused partially not paying attention to her


"What's her name?" - Jade


"Err... Nadia?" - Cole


"Nadia? That model? You've been trying to flirt with her for years and she finally said yes? Gotta admire her resistance for this long, I have to admit." - Jade


"Errr, nevermind! I just have a lot on my plate today." - Cole says


"....... did something happen?" - Jade


"Uh, you could say that......... " - Cole


Jade stands on her knees and waddles over to Cole


"Tell me what happened. I'll stop poking you if you tell me." - Jade says while poking Cole on the shoulder


"Well, i kind of... almost died." - Cole says


Jade stops poking him and jerks back


"What? Hey, what's that supposed to mean?!" - Jade says worried


"I almost got hit by a car. I dropped my ring on the road and had to get it back." - Cole



Jade slinks back to the corner and sits down


"Stupid. So goddamn stupid and reckless. This is your life were talking about. Be more responsible with yourself Cole, you stupid idiot!" - Jade says annoyed


"................" - Cole says nothing knowing that this isn't the only time Jade has chided him before in the past about being more responsible considering Cole is so carefree and reckless.


"Still even with that curse, that was pretty reckless, even for me to jump in the street like that. I have her to look after and she has no one around here to watch over her. She'll probably hate me for a long while now and not trust me. Ugh damn it. Really screwed up now. Does she hate me after this? I have to know." - Cole thinks to himself


He lifts up and arm and looks at his ring again then to Jade who keeps brushing Pepper's fur, although she still wears a concerned look on her face.


"Alter reality huh? Maybe I can quickly know what she's thinks about me and I can better myself. Then again, I should just tell her about this thing in the first place and that can lighten things up. I can't sit here and do nothing." - Cole thinks
11.title: Contract: Cole I

111.content:
Feeling guilty and worrying his sister like this, Cole knows he acted totally like an idiot, so he wants to know how she feels about him.
He slides his finger and touches the crystal and makes the request:


=I wish to know what Jade thinks of me=

--------------------------------------------------------------

Like a sudden flash, Cole is shocked and disoriented a bit but notices that things have completely changed around him.


Cole looks across himself and feels a sense of dread:


Through his eyes, he see's himself sitting on the ground, however he's WEARING Jade's clothes and holding Pepper in his hands. From the looks of it, the clothes are fitted to his own roundish frame, the stockings, Jade's dress and striped undershirt and sleeves.


He puts Pepper down and reaches for his head and feels long straight hair down to his back exactly like Jade's hairstyle. He also can feel the Eagle ring as one of Jade's left earrings which seems to fit him as a head accessory now.


"I'm Jade. I was not expecting this." - Cole thinks to himself


Cole gulps and looks over to the couch to barely see Jade's body herself sitting in Cole's place wearing Cole's red shirt and black tie which has been specially fitted to Jade's small body. At first he didn't even recognize her because she wears a lot of makeup, but here she has no makeup on her face and her hair has been styled exactly in the way Cole's hair was.


As he looks at the changed Jade, several feelings wash over him. Looking at the girl, he feels nothing but worry and fear for the person sitting on the couch and it starts tying his stomach in knots.


"I'm feeling her emotions. I was right all along. She's scared for me and I don't even feel any hatred for that person. She would never hate me. I was stupid to even think she would hate me. The ring was able to do it after all. It's funny, but I really feel like my sister and not me even though mentally I'm Cole, but this body and these feelings are Jade's. These are hers." - Cole thinks to himself


Cole gets up from the ground and in a Jade-like manner without thinking it walks on her knees and sits next to 'Cole' who has her hand clenched against her face. Cole gets a close up appearance of his changed sister and even though they both look ridiculous, he feels he has no reason to laugh. these are Jade's own eyes and she see's her brother even though Cole's mind is clearly himself.


Finally the goth Cole speaks:


"Please understand. You have your life ahead of you..... Cole. Think of me and don't take so many risks, okay si.... uh bro." - Cole tries to say in what his sister would say to him although doing this was far easier in his current form


"You're really miffed. I uh.... I'm sorry. I'll be careful from now on." - Jade says putting her hand on Cole's shoulder


Though Jade's emotions, Cole feels that 'he's just saying that. He doesn't mean it, and I wish he would really change.' This hits Cole hard.


"I definitely promise you that I'll change." - Cole thinks to himself


Jade gets up and heads to the bathroom then to the kitchen.


"I'll get dinner started Jade after cleaning up. You must be starving." - Jade


"Thanks." - You say smiling. You can't help but let Jade's emotions overtake you and smile after hearing food.


Left alone, Pepper leaps to your side and lies next to you. You pet your kitty, Pepper purrs and you reach for your earlobe.


"Time to set things right. Thank you curse for setting me right." - Cole says then makes the change closing his eyes


=I wish to be back to normal= - Cole wishes


--------------------

This time being prepared, Cole opens his eyes to see himself in the mirror back in his own body again. He washes up and prepares dinner for the two of them. They eat in silence and finish up. Cole grabs the seat next to Jade.

"You're right. I will be more careful from now on." - Cole


"Okay okay, I kno........" - Jade


"I MEAN IT!" - you blurt out


Jade jerks back in shock


"It's been nagging at me since I went to clean up and will continue to get to me unless I can honestly assure you. Jade, I was totally reckless, and I didn't think of you when I jumped in the street. Not anymore. You're still young and I may be a clown, but I'm your brother and I have to watch over and protect you since all we have is each other in this place. I won't take stupid risks anymore, I PROMISE you I'll be more careful and responsible.." - Cole


Jade only smiles, this time different than what you expect her which likely means she'll believe you this time. You never came off as a strong or vocal presence till know and after what you learned from her you truly mean what you said. No meaningless or dangerous risks.


"Okay dummy, can you back away now, your meat loaf breath is starting to knock me out." - Jade smirks


"Derp, sorry!" - Cole says sitting back.


The two of you clean up as you sit alone in your bedroom and lie on the bed.

"The ring really did it. This thing is amazing. but sheesh, waking up AS Jade was something I didn't expect. I was wearing her clothes, but they were MY size, fat guy size. Would other people see me as my sister too? Is that what happens when I become other people? I gotta find out. Though I want to see how Jade feels about me right now, then again I wanna try the ring again. What to do." - Cole
111.title: Contract: Cole II - Understanding Jade

choices: Stay as Jade longer and see what High School is like
Return to normal and get ready for work in the morning
1111.content:
Cole lies on the bed. The idea of living as another person intrigues him a lot. Jade's own emotions and feelings completely overcame Cole and was definitely the rush.


He also wanted to know if Jade was put at ease after he assured her he'd be more careful being himself in the future.


"Here's goes nothing. Time to go goth!" - Cole says then plants a finger and tries to remember what he said earlier:


= I wish I understood Jade more =


------------------------------------------------------------------------


As before the transition is quick and flashy, however this time it was a different experience for Cole


""AAAAAAH!!!" - Cole jerks back as he sees the reflection of Jade undressing against the very large full length mirror.


Jade is in a black and white spiderweb bra and matching panties removing the corsetted dress with her pajamas lying on her bed to be put on.


"Hey! Are you okay in there Jade?" - Jade's voice echos through the door


Cole realizes where he is and responds:


"Sorry! Saw uh.... a spider!" - Cole


"You're freaked over a SPIDER? You practically ARE one." - Jade


You feel Jade's feelings going 'yeah real funny dude':


"Good one. I'm fine!" - Cole


"Mmkay!" - Jade



You catch your breath and stand behind the full length mirror. You remember you ARE your sister again as you look down to see the Spider wardrobe completely misworn against your roundish frame.


"This is totally weird I............" - Cole says as he throws the dress on the ground.



Something was off and he started to feel more and more dread. As he leaned over for the re-sized pajamas on the bed, he was able to stretch farther than he would as a guy. Starting to feel afraid, he started reaching a hand down his lower body.



"Oh no!" - Cole jerked with fright. He couldn't feel anything down below. The very organ that identified him as a man was not there even though his body was physically male. His lower body was completely flat and smooth. Sucking it up he looked down and also noticed his legs were completely hair free.


"I really AM Jade now. This is pretty fucking unnerving and I'm learning too much for me to handle about this curse." - Cole gulps as he puts on Jade's pajamas which have resized to fit him. Once he was done he took a deep breath and turned to the mirror.


He looked down to the reflection and saw in the mirror was Jade herself mimicking Cole's every movement. Jade's reflection wearing the teal pajamas, barefoot, fingernails painted, her long straight hair went down to her back above her butt. Her hair was also partially dyed with blue and teal streaks and her eyes were heavily in dark makeup and dark lipstick. Usually Jade would wash this all off during a shower but since Cole was possessing her life, there was no way in hell he was going to do that as Jade.


"JADE HURRY UP AND GET IN THE SHOWER!" - Jade's voice booms from the door.


"Oh son of a bit......" - Cole grumbles and tries to find the ring, but can't seem to find it. Getting worried, he starts throwing things all over the place trying to find it.


"AHA!!" - Cole rejoices as he makes the change very quick

-------------------------------------

Cole emerges in the hallway back as himself again.


"That was close. I'd totally take the shower if it was another girl. I didn't even see how she felt about me. I'll wait till after she's done." - Cole says as he plops in the kitchen bar stool and turns on the TV to the news.


Jade leaves her room a little disorganized.


"What's wrong with you?" - Cole


"Don't go in there!" - Jade says a little nervous


"Uh why? What did you break?" - Cole says even though he knows it's probably because he himself messed up her room


"Don't worry about it!" - Jade says as she runs into the shower with clothes in hand


She closes the door and begins her shower. Cole though keeps eyeing his ring and admiring it beginning to understand it more and more. He realizes that it could be extremely dangerous if in the wrong hands so he decides to keep the ring a secret only to himself. Cole continues watching the news as Jade finishes up her shower. Hearing the sound of the locks unlocking, he begins to use the ring's power:


= I wish to know what Jade thinks of me = - Cole says this time only focusing on just KNOWING what she thinks of him, however it doesn't go right:

--------------------------------------------

From his perspective, the bathroom door opens as he realizes where he is again:


"GOD DAMN IT!" - Cole thinks only to himself as he assumes the role of his sister again


"This thing only switches people's roles it seems!" - Cole thinks


Cole walks down the hallways where he plops down on the couch. Pepper leaps to join him. Cole looks over to see his transformed sister watching TV. Again Cole searches through Jade's feelings and emotions trying to understand himself and is surprised that his sister doesn't feel worried anymore after their talk earlier in the day. When Cole looks at Jade sitting on the bar stool, he can sense Jade's nerves are calmed and that's all he needed to know.


"I told you Rachel was sick right?" - Jade


"Yeah I know." - Cole


"Well, I'm gonna back off for a bit on Rachel and focus on other women." - Jade


"WAIT WHY?!" - Cole jerks up in a very un-Jade-like way. Cole has been primping and hitting on his boss Rachel for a long while that it borderlines on being dangerous considering he might risk his job.


"Huh? You WANTED me to keep trying with Rachel? That's not like you." - Jade


"Uh no, that's right. Yeah you better stop then, you better not risk your job." - Cole says even though he realized this was to be true even though he would have loved to be with Rachel his boss.


"You've opened my eyes. I got to stop taking stupid risks which might get me killed, in reality or financially. Customers though is gonna be tough to wean myself on. Bye bye Nadia." - Jade


"Yeah, bye Nadia. God damn it." - Cole quietly groans as well.


"Guess I gotta find some other babes to work my manly charms on." - Jade says out of character


"Bwahahahahahaha!!" - Cole suddenly erupts in laughter


"Yeah yeah quiet you." - Jade says a little peeved


Cole keeps laughing. Only because of what he's hearing from his stern and serious sister saying something that normally HE would say in Jade's voice which totally makes him loose it.


"Alright shut up get to bed! You got school." - Jade stands and points to your bedroom


Cole gets up and decided what to do next.
1111.title: Contract: Cole III - Going Goth Again

choices: Cole gives in to his responsibility's and goes to bed
Cole decides to test out his new powers
11112.content:
Cole stood there astonished at everything, though he did not yet have full control over this rings powers he was more than capable of using its full potential. Cole glanced back down at the ring still wrapped tightly around his finger and pulled it in closely. he inspected the ring before looking back upstairs. "I wish to be me again" he yelled, for a second nothing happens. however he soon felt himself changing, shifting back into his original form. Cole proceeded to pat himself down, inspecting his body again. Cole ran towards the nearest mirror and checked his reflection, he was back to normal head to toe clothes and all. Cole let out a sigh of relief as he leaned against the wall, "seems like i got this ring deal all figured out" he reassured himself. he let out a slight smirk at the realization of the possibilities this ring would allow him, and as to how far he could go with it.

lost in his imagination he soon snapped out of it, realizing that it was now much later than he had anticipated it wouldn't be too long before Cole would have to go to sleep in order to wake up in time for his job the next day. though a much more devious thought came across Cole's mind, if he could be Jade for a while who else could he be? a few more hours wouldn't hurt, right|? he could always call in sick, or perhaps do something a little more mischievous. thoughts began to flood Cole's mind, but his job responsibility kept on nagging to him. What should Cole do?
11112.title: Return to normal and get ready for work in the ...

choices: Cole try's to be someone he knew.
111122.content:
sorry, I know its short but i had to set it up like this to create alternate branches. :3



Cole decided that these new powers of his took priority over anything else he would have done tomorrow, and with that decision he ran back across the room and threw himself back down. Cole pondered on who to try or what to try first. He knew he could get away with being jade, but was there more to this ring perhaps? He sat there in thought, could he be someone fictitious? could he alter others? to what extent? all these questions came rushing to Cole at once.

after some though cole decided to try...
111122.title: Cole decides to test out his new powers

1111222.content:
Cole decided to try someone from the past, not his own but someone historical. he rushed up thinking about who to be but soon a problem had begun to arise. If he became someone famous there could be some major repercussions to that. Cole had to think, and in his haste something clicked. An old book tucked away in the corner, Cole dashed towards the book and brought it up to his face. Dusting it he read the title aloud, "Egyptian royalties?" he questioned. Not sure what to do he decided to give it a shot. He flipped the book open and flickered through the pages rapidly, he turned and turned before stumbling along one particular princess that caught his eye.

Princess Zatiya, 20. Cole became mesmerized by her appearance, though only an artist depiction he felt entranced by what was before him. Coles interest soon began to shift with excitement of the prospect of becoming someone who had existed thousands of years ago. Letting out a small grin Cole shined the ring with his thumb and reached out with it. "I wish to become princess... Zati? Zata? Zatiya!?" He yelled. The ring shined brightly and Cole soon began to feel the ring alter and shift him. He became smaller, his skin tone changed to a rich caramel color. his features became more feminine, and his clothes too began to change similar to what was shown within the book. The book itself fell from his now smaller hands and hit the floor with a thud. Cole reached his hands outwards and began to take in his new appearance, before looking down and spotting the two new mounds upon his chest.

Cole felt the shifting soon stop, had he done it? had he morphed into her? he was sure he had from his current perspective but he needed to know for sure. Cole rushed back to the mirror from earlier and gazed upon his new appearance. There he stood, there stood Princess Zatiya. he stepped closer, brushing his new wavy long dark blue her aside as he did so. Cole was lost at the sight before him, his clothes had changed into elegant silk robes that covered his new form. However Cole's interest soon shifted as he noticed the two ornaments dangling from his new chest. He raised his hands upwards towards them, spotting the ring still on his finger as he did so. He clutched his new breasts tightly and gave them a firm squeeze, the shock first putting him through some minor pain, but at the same time he could feel pleasure like no other before. Cole enjoyed this look and this new body. But what to do with it now? Cole continued to admire his new form, pulling various poses in front of the mirror as well as getting more "experienced" with his new form.
1111222.title: Cole try's someone historical.

1112.content:
Getting up from the bed, Cole decides that it's all for the best and he did what he could for his sister to trust him. Knowing it won't be easy to be more careful, he takes on that challenge and turns in for the night. With his new-found power, he looks forward to going to work in the morning.


-----------------

The morning follows.

After taking Jade to school, Cole arrives to work at his bank job meeting with costumers, hoping to offer them his company's services in a face to face manner although he has to tone it down a bit.


"Your loan has been direct deposited to you. Thanks fine. No problem, thanks Nadia." - Cole on the phone


"That's it Cole? You're not going to sweet talk me again?" - Nadia


"Sorry Nadia, but I have to be more serious at work. I've done a lot of reckless things lately, so I'm being more careful. Nothing personal, but I want this to be strictly business." - Cole


"Your sister threw down the gauntlet huh?" - Nadia


"Something like that. Your payment is due on the 18th. Thanks bye bye." - Cole hangs up then drops the phone and clutching his head in agony



"I don't believe you actually turned down hitting on someone. Strictly business. This is quite the shock. I'm impressed." - Margaret



"Don't rub it in. I'm really trying here." - Cole



"There are ways you can still work your magic. They're called 'BARS' dude. Just do it when your shift is over." - Steven


"Funny." - Cole says annoyed. At this time someone enters the bank floor


"Morning everyone, I'm back!" - Rachel Powell returns from her sick leave. She is Cole's boss, very wealthy and a CEO to their bank. Cole's been trying to hit on her although pretty dangerously. Luckily she has a sense of humor to tolerate him and she knows he works hard at his job.


"Test number two." - Cole says out loud, while the other co-workers smirk


Rachel greet her tellers and walks down the line of her employees. When she comes to Cole she stops as Cole greets her with a look. Rachel was stunning and beautiful. Tall, long wild red hair fitted to a bun, a dark green power suit and vintage retro glasses complete her look.


"Morning Cole, how's my favorite employee doing?" - she says with an emphasis on 'favorite employee'


"Hey Boss, pretty alright. Got Nadia's loan approved, otherwise been an alright morning. " - Cole


"Uh.. oh good! Er, keep up the good work then." - Rachel is surprised then walks off


"Will do!" - Cole


"Wow, casual Cole is scaring me." - Margaret jokes


"Sorry but I'm gonna be more professional around here!" - Cole


"Cole, here's another invoice about your car. Tell those people they're using the wrong fax address already!" - Stephanie another coworker gives him the paper


"THREE HUNDRED EXTRA DOLLARS!?" - Cole explodes. Momentarily bring everyone to attention.


"So much for professional" - Steven


"I-I can't pay this! The rent bills are already starting to rise as it is, and then this car payment rising too. Ugh. Freaking hell." - Cole gets up


"Where are you going?" - Margaret


"To buy a lottery ticket and hope I strike it rich.......


.....Oh!" - Cole remembers


His coworkers look at him confused and see him off heading to the bathroom.


Inside, Cole washes up and looks at his ring.


"I can't go overboard and change things, but I need to start earning more in this job. I need cash, plus I don't want to simply wish my problems away, that's taking the easy way out. Maybe I can wish for an automatic raise or something. I don't want to talk to Rachel about raises considering my current predicament, but ugh." - Cole groans


Inserting a finger, he activates the ring's dark magic again and makes his request:


=I want to earn more in my job=


* * *
1112.title: Contract: Cole - Wealth and Power I

11121.content:
The transitioning process was very different for Cole because he expected to still be in his bank's bathroom but with a higher pay, however, he found himself.....elsewhere.


He was in a bed, the last fleeting moments of being asleep. Opening his eyes he freaked out at his new surroundings.



"Where am I?!" - Cole


Looking around, the bedroom was semi small, but fancy looking. Cole looks down to inspect himself, but was only wearing a t-shirt and pajama pants.


"Who did I become now? Wait, it looks too hazy to be mid morning. What time is it!?" - Cole jumps up and looks for a clock. He finds a large clock with the date in it and notices that it's 6:38am on the same day.


"I went back in time about 5 hours? Okay where's the mirror?" - Cole looks around the room for one. He finds the closet hoping to see a mirror, but the 'closet' leads to a large dressing room full of dresser doors. A make shift bathroom is also at the end of this closet and there in itself is a mirror obviously. Cole runs over to the bathroom and looks at the appearence.


"WAAAAAH! NO!!!!!" - Cole screams from surprise


Staring at his reflection.........







..... was his boss Rachel Powell(38)!



"That's REALLY funny Eagle Ring. Now I'm Rachel. I said I wanted a raise, not be my boss who makes a hell of a lot than me!!" - Cole says annoyed



"......................."



"Wait....... I'm..... Rachel...... " - Cole starts having those fleeting feelings again for her. He stares at her reflection for a good number of minutes, her wild, red hair all over the place and mimicked to Cole's own black hair with the same style as her. The Eagle Ring has also transformed into a bracelet which is on an end table next to her bed.




"No...... ugh damn it. I never thought I would take own my Bosses life, but I've never seen her look like this before..... ugh those urges again." - Cole says then starts reaching down unknowingly to him and that's when he takes notice that his manhood is gone.



"What the CRAP!?" - Cole yells after feeling around and finding out that his lower body is smooth



"That's uh...new. Great I AM Rachel now...... I can't take this anymore." - Cole says placing a hand on his face staring at his reflection doing the same



"But maybe if live as her I can figure out how she thinks and know how to butter her up for a raise. All I know about her is that she's rich, works hard, is single, and can put up with me, other than that nothing!" - Cole



He takes another look at Rachel again and the longer he keeps staring at her, the more and more over the edge he gets. He starts lowering his hand again unconsicously inside his pajamas and makes contact with Rachel's crotch which is now his.



"Aaaah!' - Cole cries out in shame, but overall shock. He may have his body which he himself perceives, but it appears the curse only made him THINK he had his own body. He WAS Rachel and possessed all her womanly features and her actual BODY. Rachel's crotch was extremely sensitive to Cole's touch and it surprised even him and all this made it worse for him.


"God damn it I can't take it anymore, should I get out of here or suck it up and try to understand her by BEING HER?" - Cole thinks
11121.title: Contract: Cole - Wealth and Power II

choices: Jade Lewis (15) Cole's Gothic Mature Sister
Sabrina Lewis (11) Cole's youngest sister. Lives in the country
12.content:
======================================================================== ===

"NO! I have no guarantee what you're saying is the truth!! I decline!" - Cole


"Very well..............."


==================================================================== =======


Time resumes in full normal speed, however unfortunate Cole's life had come to an end by an oncoming car.



A week passes as the funeral processions begin with Cole's co-workers, friends and family naturally crying and mourning. The funeral sadly ends as he's laid to rest.


However someone else will acquire the rings power and be forced to use it for their own.


Who is next in line to claim it's power?
12.title: Cole: "I refuse to harbor evil like you!"

choices: Accept the contract and be unsure of the consequences after.....
121.content:
* Jade's color code is teal
* Jade lived with Cole in their three bedroom apartment in LA
* Cole has been killed and left Jade alone

------------------------------------------------------------------------

The news of Cole being killed had just reached the news of Jade after noticing he had not returned home. Fearing the worse and making those fears reality, Jade heard the unfortunate news from the police at their apartment. The police left behind Jade the golden Eagle Ring that belonged to Cole.


Completely devastated, Jade locked herself up in her room and let it all out. This was even more hurtful because she also lost her father early on in life and was very attached to him. Similarly, she felt the same way to Cole, not like a brother but as a father figure (Because of the age gap) to her since he was supportive of her and raised her on his own for the past 5 years despite his somewhat outrageous personality. He kept himself grounded and knew when there was a time for jokes and wit and when it came down to supporting someone and himself.


Afterwards Jade did the following followup work with the police, contacted her family out of state with the sad news, stayed with the police a while since she was dependent and was ordered to move back with her mother and younger sister out in the middle of nowhere.

But she didn't want to leave though and wanted to stay in LA and in Cole's apartment. She probably couldn't stay there and would have a better shot of living with friends. Her friends had already started making procedures so that she could live with them, likely her fellow goth friend Kathy, but the stress would soon start catching up to her coming up:

---------------------------------------------

In another rainy evening, Jade exits the police department and starts waiting at the bus stop. It comes and she gets on sits alone on the side of the bus looking at Cole's ring that she wears on her hand.


Following the trip on the bus, unbeknownst to Jade, a car starts swerving and comes uncontrollable thanks to the rain picking up, the breaks can't catch and goes flying into the lane with the bus. It can't stop before the red light.


"AAH!!!!" - Jade turns behind to the window to see the car at fast speed collide with the bus inches to where Jade is at. It only takes a split second before Jade starts flying to the other side of the bus, but doesn't make impact as she transitions realities:


=============================================

Jade awakens and find herself in an unusual predicament. Time has frozen and the bus has been torn by the impact of the oncoming car, The exact point to when time has frozen has Jade till inside the bus while it is starting to split in two with the car. Glass shattering is frozen in midair from the glass and windows. Jade herself is standing on firm ground however she's standing at an angle as the bus itself is in an angle completely uneven with Jade.

She looks down to find her uneven invisable footing is causing an aura of black and violet glowing energy surround her shaped as a skull.



"......................." - Jade is frozen silent and tries to make sense of what just happened.


"I have saved you child."


"What's going on here. Who s-said that?!" - Jade


"I act as a mediary for the Eagle Ring you possess. By saving you from death, a contract has been reached between you and the ring."


"A contract. Cole's ring saved me?" - Jade


"Yes......"


"What do you want?" - Jade


"By saving you, you are responsible for using my dark powers. By concentrating and inserting a finger and touching the crystal, you are allowed to alter and bend reality to your every whim."


"Whats the catch? Using such powerful magic, there has to be a catch." - Jade


"The only catch is that you must be careful at all times, never to reveal my power or else the wrong hands will abuse this power and create destruction."


"What am I supposed to change? My life has already been destroyed as it is." - Jade


"The contract hopefully can ease your pain. Although the contract cannot revive the dead but only alter the living....."


"!!!!!!!!!!!!!" - Jade sharply jerks and looks around


"My power was created only to help the future of mankind. The dark arts go way back into centuries. People shunned our magic because it would take a long time for this magic to be perfected, however it has long been perfected and rests in your hands now to do what you please. Take your mind off your pain or perhaps adjust yourself so you can live better."


"............" - Jade


"But ONLY if you accept the contract. If you do not, then time will resume and you will be at the mercy of the consequences before I saved you."


"AAAH NO!" - Jade jerks and looks at the crash with the car tearing open the side of the bus, the glass cracking


"I'd be........" - Jade


"Make your choice!"


Jade slinks down to her knees and thinks.


"Wait a minute......" - Jade bites her lip then gets up in a jolt


"WHAT DID YOU DO TO COLE? He didn't accept this contract did he?! And that's why he.......

he......


No....." - Jade begins to tear up again


"Cole made the decision himself. He chose not to invoke my power and I resumed time for him."


"JUST TO GET HIM KILLED! You probably triggered that whole sequence of events just to step in and invoke your contract! Pure evil." - Jade yells


"Whether I am evil or not is your point of view. You do have the choice, just make your decision."



"And if I say yes? What happens when time resumes? I'll still be in this accident!" - Jade



"..............................."< br />


"Damn it....." - Jade says confused. She has no idea what to believe of the mediator or if she'll be safe or not no matter what decision she chooses. Jade starts feeling conflicted then depressed. Still emotionally broken and unsure what to do.


But she has to make a choice here:
121.title: Jade Lewis

choices: Something weird happens with the request
Readers Choice or make a different request
1211.content:
* Jade's color code is teal
* Jade lived with Cole in their three bedroom apartment in LA
* Cole has been killed and left Jade alone

------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Make your choice......"


"....Aaah...." - Jade bites her lip, then tearfully makes her choice:


"Okay I accept the contract! BUT GET ME OUT OF THIS ACCIDENT! I WANT TO LIVE!!!! " - Jade yells


"So be it......."

--------------------------------------------------------------

Another bright flash, in like a dream transition has Jade snap back to reality. Expecting herself to go flying through the other side of the bus, Jade awakens to see herself still sitting down with the Eagle Ring on her finger and clutching her toy plush of a black cat similar to her cat Pepper back home.


"I'm alright. I did get saved." - Jade thinks then sulks again. She had a long day after all this still has to talk with some people back home about the accident. It's all too much for a young kid to handle even though she's normally calm and mature about things. She crouches over and sits sideways on the seat wrapping her arms around her stripped legs. Her finger unknowingly fiddles around with the ring and touches the crystal that the Eagle's claw holds. Thinking about trying to head home and just sleep, she pictures Cole's apartment in her head.

This triggers the ring to activate and she gets swept up in another flash of light.


--------------------------------


Jade blinks again and finds herself inside her bedroom back home. Her room is red and black painted with purple carpeting, all clad in gothic rock band posters and her queen size bed is draped in black spiderweb like silk. Her cat Pepper is lying on the bed.


"Waaah............


I'm back home? So this is the real thing." - Jade looks at it.


A knock on the door surprises Jade.


"Young lady, we'd like for you to sign some paperwork. Only two documents and we'll be on our way. Our officer Natalie is all set to watch over you for tonight, so you can get some rest. It won't take long." - Came Charlie, a police officer


Natalie was a nice policewoman who watched over Jade and told her the bad news. She's tall, blonde in a ponytail and very beautiful. However Jade slumped to her bed and just wanted this to be over. She grew frustrated being so dependent and powerless. She grew tired of everyone getting in her business when she wanted to be alone and not think about this legal mumbo jumbo.


"I want to get out of here. I'm tired of this........" - Jade slips a finger in the ring and makes a wish:


"I wish I was totally independent..........."
1211.title: Contract: Jade I - Jade accepts

12111.content:
================

Like a sudden jolt to Jade, she felt something happen but was unsure what changed. Getting off her bed she looks down on herself and noticed she's wearing different clothing. A black tank-top, blue jeans and barefoot with black painted toenails.


"This is weird. Just a change of........" - Jade says as she fiddles with her hair



"MY HAIR!" - She could feel it. Her hair was completely cut short to a boyish style. Her long, precious hair was completely gone.



"Where's my mirror?!" - Jade fidgets but can't find one. She turns her attention outside since the bathroom has a full length mirror and where she does her makeup.



Walking over to the large red bedroom door, she puts an ear outside to listen to the cops, but strangely she can't hear anything outside. Swallowing her pride, she opens the door and leaves her bedroom and finds:




The whole apartment empty. The cops are gone.





"Where did they all go?" Jade says then she looks at the ring.



"I just wished for independence so I'm probably able to live by myself now. I don't understand why I have to change looks though." - Jade



The front door knocks as Jade is caught off guard and walks over and answers it. Outside is Officer Natalie:



"Hello Miss Jade, sorry to intrude again. I just wanted to leave some leftover reports about the accident for you. I'm so sorry." - Natalie



"Ah... uh, oh thank you." - Jade says quietly remembering that what's done is done, and Cole is gone.



Natalie notices Jade tear a little



"Again, I'll leave you be to mourn your younger brother. You have my number if you want to hang out when I'm off duty. I'm sorry." - Natalie says quietly.then excuses herself out



"!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" - Jade gulps and uses the couch to maintain her balance




'YOUNGER brother?!!" - Jade chokes up on spit and runs to the bathroom. Finding the full length mirror, she looses the ability to speak for a moment as she see's her reflection.




Jade was looking at a FAR older version of herself in the mirror.




Jade was about 27 or 28 in her reflection, a little older than Cole was. Gained about a foot and a half of height, she was an adult woman however she was completely her fifteen year old self when she looked down at herself. Her tank top was a little loose and the jeans were a little baggy as well, plus her makeup on her face was completely gone.


She was completely blown away by her older looking reflection. Her older self was quite the natural beauty. Nothing overly sexy, her adult chest was about a B to a C cup, hips were a little wide and her short, ruffled, boyish haircut which looked weird as her fifteen year old self, but looks a lot better as an adult. Think Emma Watson except black hair.



"So this must be what it means to be independent huh? Wow." - Jade



She gets out of the bathroom to look for more evidence. After looking over bills and other papers. Jade learned she did indeed still live with Cole and they both shared the bills. Jade was totally independent and was born around the same decade as Cole was, however she still was Jade the little girl and knew nothing about living on her own. She wasn't sure if she had a job or went to school unless she checked out her room for info. She was overwhelmed and plopped down on the couch to take a breather.



Her kitty Pepper leaps and sits on her lap.


"Glad to see things never change"


"Now what do I do?" - Jade says as she hugs her kitty
12111.title: Contract: Jade II - Jade's Independence 1

choices: Get dressed and find her brother at work
12113.content:
And without warning, Jade found herself waking up in bed. Except when she sat up, she noticed it wasn't HER bed or even HER apartment.


She sat in bed while the cobwebs of sleep slowly crept away. Once she was fully awake, the realization finally hit her and she began to freak out since she didn't know how she ended up in her new surroundings.


"Where am I and what am I wearing?!" - Jade


Jade looked around at the bedroom she now sat in. It wasn't that big, but everything in it looked expensive. It was then that Jade realized that this had to have something to do with that wish she just made. She looked down to inspect herself to see if what kind of changes happened to her. She still looked and felt the same, however she was now wearing a green t-shirt and bright girly pajama pants.


"Eww. These clothes make me wanna gag. These clothes and apartment are not mine. So where am I and what is going on!?" - Jade jumped out of bed and began looking around. She saw a large clock that had the date on it along with the time. That's when she noticed that the date on it was two weeks ago. If it was right, then today is the day Cole gets killed!


"Cole! If this is all real, I need to find him! Okay I need to get dressed." - Jade looked around the room for any clothes. The room had lots of nice furniture, but nothing that looked like a dresser or anywhere clothes could be stored in. She did see what she thought looked like a closet. Stepping into the 'closet', Jade found it lead to a large dressing room full of dresser drawers, hanging business outfits and several racks of shoes. There was even an open bathroom in the corner. She still didn't know where she was but this place looked like it belonged to somebody that was extremely rich.


She browsed through all the outfits that were hanging up. All of them looked like they belonged to a mature woman and would be too large on her smaller teenage frame. Even thought nothing looked like it would fit, Jade still spent a couple minutes picking out something that at least was close to her style. Eventually she settled on a black Italian pantsuit that she couldn't even pronounce the name of. She took it over to the dressing mirror on the wall.


"AAAAAH!!!" - Jade startledly screamed as she dropped the outfit that she had been holding.


She stared at her reflection in shock.........





..... her reflection was that of Cole's boss Rachel Powell(38)!





"What. The. Fuck." - Jade muttered as she watched Rachel in the mirror move her lips as she was saying the exact same thing. All she wished for was to be totally independent, not to become Cole's rich boss. She didn't even know that the Eagle Ring could make her become somebody else.


"I'm..... her......!?! " - Jade started thinking. Staring at her reflection for a moment, Jade became curious and tried something. She started making weird poses and faces and watched as Rachel in the mirror mimicked her perfectly. Jade saw her wild, red hair that was all over the place while sitting on her shoulders in the same way Jade's hair was. As she brought up her hand to her face, Jade saw that The Eagle Ring also changed into a more fancy looking bracelet which now was on her wrist.


"Ugh.. I have to find Cole." - Jade said unenthusiastically. Even though Jade met Cole's boss, Rachel only once; She still thought that she was pretty. The kind of pretty that she knew her older brother fawned over.


"If my brother is alive and hits on me, I'm going to be scarred for life." - Jade thought to herself as she saw Rachel's reflection look like she shared the same sentiment.


Staring at the reflection of the Eagle bracelet in the mirror, Jade decided to...
12113.title: Jade wakes up as Rachel Powell

1212.content:
"I have no guarantees from you that I'll be safe no matter WHAT I choose!" - Jade yells


Jade runs to the front of the bus and slides out the door to the street away from the accident site. Trying to move the people in the way away from harm.


"Move damn it!!" - Jade


Jade backs away from the frozen crowd in the way of the bus and starts to realize that they're doomed. She makes a break away from the site as far as she can run hoping not to witness the horrifying site.



As she gets as far away as she can she gets interrupted.




"Made your decision. This is your last notice!"




Jade takes a deep breath and hopes for the best.



"No... I decline, I have way of trusting what you say, no matter what choice I make! I SAY NO!" - Jade yells




"Very well......."



In a brilliant flash of light, Jade returns to reality, yet however as far as she ran and the distance she made.......................
















.........she was STILL on the bus when time had resumed just after the car hit the bus and Jade's world came crashing down that day.................
1212.title: Contract: Jade I - Jade declines

choices: Jade Lewis (15) Morgan's Goth Daughter in LA
Sabrina Lewis (11) Morgan's Younger Daughter with Morgan
122.content:
* Morgan's color code is Maroon
* Morgan lives out in Iowa with her boyfriend Andrew and Daughter Sabrina
* They live on a farm and horse corral

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----

Following the unfortunate death of Cole, time passes for everyone who was involved with him. .

Months pass as the scene is set on a farmhouse in De Moines Iowa. Cole Lewis' mother Morgan lives here with her boyfriend Andrew Richardson, and her own younger daughter Sabrina. Having lost her old husband and now her son, she's done her share of grieving by herself. She's disabled from the waist down and cannot walk so she only travels via wheelchair.

Her personality is very upbeat and bright. She loves her children and is pretty childish and reckless in nature just like Cole was.

The only memento she was given along with the photographs and video were his Eagle Ring that she proudly wears with her at all times now.

---------------

In a bright and humid afternoon out in the country, Morgan and Andrew reach the base of a hill where Morgan made a makeshift memorial of her son and former husband and honor both their memories. Knowing how tough this is, Andrew lets her be and walks down the hill to wait for her while she mourns.

Morgan continues her mourning then says one final prayer. Wiping the sweat from her forehead, she reaches over in her chair to find a bottled water but see's it nearly empty.


"Darn it. I better hurry back. It's getting very hot out here." - Morgan


She looks to the tombstones again:


"You boys keep looking down and watching over us. " - Morgan smiles as she starts heading down the hill


The heat becomes a little too much as she starts getting lightheaded and looses control of her chair, swerving along, she looses control and goes flying down the hill.


"MORGAN!!" - Andrew yells as he tries to catch up to her.


Morgan, still out of it, slowly regains her composure but her chair starts picking up speed and continues sailing down the steep hill and then off the trail completely.....


".........uh...huh...." - Morgan


The chair does a leap off the edge and jettisons itself into a large hole that used to be partially boarded up.


"AAAAH NO!!!" - Morgan yells as she regains complete control of herself again and she falls deep into the tunnel


"No..... I'm gonna die.... I'm gonna......." - Morgan thinks as she plummets down the steep cavern


======================================


In a flash Morgan blinks and finds herself safely on the ground floor of the murky cavern. Behind her is a waterfall that has stopped in time.


"I'm alright? No, this is some kind of dream. I was falling! Was I saved? Cole? Honey.....?" - Morgan


"Not Cole.............. but you were saved."


"AAAH!" - Morgan jerks but cannot see where the quiet voice comes from


"Who are you?!" - Morgan


"I can only communicate with you this once in times when the ring wearers are in great danger. Because I froze reality and slowed time to a millisecond, a contract to use my power of the ring has begun."


"Ring wearers? You mean this ring here? What kind of Contract am I a part of?!" - Morgan


"Your ancestors used the dark arts to manipulate phenomenon. An extremely dangerous art in order to prevent wars, disease and other unfortunate circumstances. These dark arts were shunned upon because perfecting them and the crystals in the ring would take centuries to fully become usable. Now that you've triggered it's power, the power to alter reality is finally perfected and now rests in your hands. In order to keep my power from waning, increased use of my power must be regularly used. However whether you use this for good or evil is up to you, but be aware of the consequences should this fall into the wrong hands. I only act as a mediary and I have no conscience, only the user does.

Along with my power to bend reality, you are given a secondary ability to slow down time exactly where you are now, In this limbo. Time here has slowed to 1/1000 the accentuated speed, and because you are in this state, you can not die, be starved for food, needing to dispel wastes or age. You can freely travel anywhere you want, and then return everything to normal using the ring. Insert your finger and concentrate to what kind of alteration you want and it will happen. You can also teleport anywhere this way by thinking of the location as long as you have a clear picture of what the location looks like.

I must dispel from you, I must have your vow. Will you accept the contract and continue use of my abilities. Granted you know what should happen should you decline. "


"I.... would be falling to my death if I decline. I have no choice then. YES I ACCEPT THE CONTRACT!" - Morgan yells


"So be it....."


"WAIT! Would this power..........." - Morgan


"No..... my power cannot resurrect those who have died. I can only effect the living here and now. Use of the ring is now yours."


"................. wait, life or death. And if I were to decline.......? Did Cole.....?" - Morgan thinks of this and then she's engulfed in a bright light

----------------------

Before Morgan could do anything she finds herself at the bottom of the hill completely fine.


"Cole...... why didn't you accept this contract and live?" - Morgan says then looks up to see Andrew appear and help her to their car. The ride back is a very quiet one. Morgan fights back tears now knowing what her stubborn son should have done in the first place. She was now forever indebted to the ring's magic.


Morgan sits alone in their bedroom. Andrew is out bringing the horses together and closing up the stable. Morgan holds the ring in her hand and wonders what to do.


"If I'm to use this thing, I might as well not make any selfish changes. Wishing to walk again is out of the question since I've accepted my disability and this ring can teleport me anywhere. I just want to see my daughter Jade again. I want all my daughters to be here with me. Okay ring, time to make a request." - Morgan states:

= I want to be with my daughter, I want to know how she's doing = - Morgan says. Before she can continue with her long request, the ring activates and alters reality.


Where does Morgan find herself becoming?
122.title: Contract: Morgan Lewis

choices: To make her Momma walk again
To be as helpful and strong as Cole was
124.content:
* Sabrina's color code is pink
* Morgan's color code is Maroon
* Sabrina lives out in Iowa with her mother Morgan and her boyfriend Andrew
* Morgan is disabled and rides a wheelchair
* They live on a farm and horse corral

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Following the unfortunate death of Cole, time passes for everyone who was involved with him. .

Months pass as the scene is set on a farmhouse in De Moines Iowa. Cole Lewis' mother Morgan lives here with her boyfriend Andrew Richardson, and her own younger daughter Sabrina. Sabrina hardly knew her older brother Cole or sister Jade, however her mother entrusted Sabrina to keep Cole's old Eagle Ring and she accepts even though she thought of it as a little weird.

Sabrina is pretty girly as well. Her favorite color is pink and is totally brainwashed by the tween pop idol stars, that she begs her mom and Andrew to buy her clothes and toys with their logo. She's pretty stubborn and gets an attitude when she doesn't get her way, but her passion is riding horses. She's a total country girl, and even speaks with an accent.

------------------------------------------------------------

"SABRINA! COME ON NOW! HURRY UP!" - Andrew yells on horseback behind to her daughter


Sabrina rides in on her horse Pete and scours the wide rural area!


"Mmmkay boy, let's git us some supper! I'm STARVING!" - Sabrina resumes her ride however something startles Pete


A wild cobra appears from behind and bites Pete head on. The horse starts wobbling and then starts losing control.


"Woah! HEY HEY BOY ARE YOU OK?! Pete! Behave!!!!" - Sabrina


The horse totally losses control now and starts dashing away with Sabrina as a hostage


"Pete! WOAH BOY! STOP! This isn't funny now!!!" - Sabrina


Pete rushes through a forested area, nicking up Sabrina with cuts and scratches. Pete slams against a tree, then another, hurling Sabrina down to the ground


The uncontrollable horse rears back and cries in pain from the poison. Sabrina turns up with various cuts to her body.


Sabrina looks over to Pete and sees the cobra still latched on


"So... that's it.... PETE!!!" - Sabrina yells as she gets up, but Pete's strong hooves knock her down again.


"AAAAH!" - Sabrina turns around and sees the powerful horse rear back ready to slam his powerful hooves right down on Sabrina's small body


"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!" - Sabrina screams in fear


======================================


Sabrina blinks and discovers that something is wrong. She finds herself standing when she was on the ground.


"What.... happened? Pete? You're frozen." - Sabrina walks over and noticed that the horse is still and silent


Sabrina looks around then to herself noticing that her cuts are gone.


"What's going on?" - Sabrina sulks and slinks down to her knees afraid and unsure of what's happened


"I have saved you"


Sabrina jumps and looks around


"I am a mediator, a voice to talk with you. the Golden ring you were given has saved your life. And now you are forever binded by the contract."


"You're this ring? Contract?" - Sabrina


"Because I saved you, you must now use the rings power. The ring will allow you to alter this world and reality to whatever you want, however do not tell anyone you have this power. Me saving you and you being here is proof that my power is real. You can be able to alter reality to anything you want by inserting your finger touching the small crystal the eagle's claw holding it and making a wish or request, and thus it will become true. Also you cannot use the ring's power to bring back anyone from the dead. The power will only change living people in this realm.

The ring also allows you to teleport anywhere you want as long as you have a clear idea where you want to go. This power is now yours. but only if you agree to the contract, otherwise if you say no, then you will be at the mercy of your animal's hooves."


"AAAH! I want to save Pete! He's poisoned!! YES! I want to be able to save him! And to make my momma walk again! I accept this contract! Please save my horse first!" - Sabrina


"So be it..........."


----------------------------------------------------------

Sabrina is engulfed by a bright flash and time has resumed again


"Wha?! Where am I? AH! PETE! YOU OK!!!" - Sabrina yells and runs over to her horse who is calm and back to normal with no signs of the cobra


Sabrina gets the ring and is now forced to believe that what happened actually happened.


"SABRINA!!" - Andrew yells as he appears on the scene


"ANDREW!!" - the little girl yells and waves over happy


"With this ring I can make momma happy again! Make her walk and not be sad anymore!" - she thinks to herself as she rides back home

------------------------------

Running up the stairs into their townhouse Sabrina races to her room and locks the door.


"Okay time to make a wish." - Sabrina kicks off her boots and sits on the rug near her stuffed animals and eyes the gold ring


"I wanna help Momma and Andrew more around the house. I'm all they have around here cept for the horses, chickens and cows. Momma told me my brother Cole was a big help building the barn here and her number one helper, so I have to wish I was just as strong, helpful, and useful as he was. She would love that. I also wanna make her walk again! But what should start with first?" - Sabrina
124.title: Contract: Sabrina Lewis

1241.content:
"My first wish is for my Momma to be able to walk again." - Sabrina said to the golden ring in her hands as she sat comfortably in her bed.


The ring gave off a faint glow, but then nothing happened. She didn't understand why it didn't do anything like it when her horse was bitten by that snake. All of a sudden, she became very sleepy. Sabrina could no longer keep her eyes open and fell back onto her stuffed animals and passed out...





......





......






Sabrina slowly woke up to an alarm going off in her room. "I don't have an alarm. That sounds like my Momma's alarm." - Sabrina thought as she opened her eyes.


It was her mother's alarm that was going off. Sabrina somehow woke up in her mother's room and didn't know how she got there. The last thing she remembered was being in her bed and making a wish for "her Momma to be able to walk again". Despite it being much earlier than she normally got up, Sabrina felt really tired still. It felt like she only got half the sleep she normally did. Suddenly she felt the bed move as someone that was in bed with her rolled over and turned the annoying alarm off.


Unsure of who was in her mother's bed with her, Sabrina sat up so she could find out. When she sat up, she not only found out who it was, but how her wish had been made.


"AHHHHHH!!!" - Sabrina shrieked in a strange but familiar voice.


Andrew Richardson had just sat up out of bed and turned off the alarm clock. He wanted to slowly wake up when all of a sudden his girlfriend, Morgan began screaming. "What's wrong Morgan" - Andrew concerningly asked.


Sabrina didn't know which was worse. The fact that she woke up in her mother's body or the fact that she was naked and so was her boyfriend, Andrew who was beside her. Looking down, all Sabrina could see were her mother's sagging breasts and aged hands which she brought to her face and covered her mouth with.


Thankfully, Andrew wasn't completely naked and got out of bed wearing underwear. Sabrina was still quite young and the thought of boys or sex haven't appealed to her yet. If she had seen Andrew's privates, she probably would have screamed louder than she previously did.


Andrew got up and hurried around the bed to Sabrina's bedside. "What's wrong Morgan? Do you need to go to the hospital?" - Andrew asked.


Sabrina was over the initial shock. Right now she didn't want to look at Andrew who was almost naked. "I'm fine. Just had a nightmare." - Sabrina said as she shielded her eyes from Andrew's nakedness.


After hearing Andrew walk away from her, Sabrina lowered her hand that covered her eyes to see him standing in the corner pulling up a pair of worn jeans that she usually saw him wearing when he worked around the farm. He was still shirtless, but it felt much less icky for Sabrina to see.


Once he got one of his flannel shirts on, Andrew headed towards the door. "I'll go make us a pot of coffee while you get dressed." - Andrew said.


After Sabrina was certain that Andrew was gone, she threw the bed sheets back and wanted to get out of bed. But she simply couldn't just do that. Her mother's legs (which were technically hers at the moment) wouldn't move. That's when she realized how her wish happened.


"My Momma can walk now because she has my body and I have hers!" - Sabrina thought to herself.


Right now all she wanted to find her mother and that terrible ring and undo this wish. Unsure how her mother got out of bed, Sabrina spotted her wheelchair a couple feet away and reached over her bed side to move it closer to her.


Getting out of bed was tougher than Sabrina thought it would be, but dressing her mother's aged and disabled body was much harder. Unused to how bras worked, Sabrina managed to slip on some panties and shorts before giving up and throwing a shirt on without a bra. She didn't have time to figure out how to put one on right now.


Satisfied that she had enough clothing on, Sabrina rolled the wheelchair that she was confined to down the hallway towards her room. She remembered locking it before making that wish and falling asleep. Right now she wished that she hadn't. Once she got to her door, she was surprised at first to find that it wasn't unlocked -until she realized that the Eagle Ring was already on her aged fingers.


She slowly rolled up and saw herself laying asleep on the top of her bed amongst all her stuffed animals. Her body was still wearing the clothes she had worn when she made that wish. Sabrina wasn't sure what to do or even what to tell her Momma.


"Morgan honey, the coffee is ready." - Andrew said loudly from down the hallway for whom he thought was his girlfriend.


Unfortunately, it did have the desired effect he wanted and Sabrina watched in horror as her body slowly began to wake up. In a panic, Sabrina quickly placed one of her now larger hands over her body's mouth...
1241.title: Contract: Sabrina - Helping Momma I

info.brief_description: After a near death experience, Cole's Eagle Ring allows him to bend reality.
info.description:
A new interactive because I felt like starting another.

Character Rules:
* NO ANIMAL TRANSFORMATIONS
* KEEP PERSONALITIES CONSISTENT AND THE SAME
* SEX IS FINE, HOWEVER I WILL MODERATE THESE CHAPTERS VERY CLOSELY

STORY DESCRIPTION:
After a near-death experience, Cole's Cursed Eagle Ring which has been passed down his family line for generations activates and saves him from certain death. After it's triggered, Cole is bound to the Ring's dangerous 'contract' and is forced to use it's power off and on because of the ring saving his life and being indebted to it's power. The ring activates a dangerous curse on Cole which allows him to warp reality.

Features:
- The ring is shaped as a Golden Eagles claw protecting a small jewel which changes colors just like a mood ring

- The ring itself is Gold save for the crystal

- TO ACTIVATE THE RING'S POWER, COLE MUST INSERT A FINGER AND TOUCH THE GEM INSIDE AND THINK UP ANYTHING HE WANTS TO HAPPEN TO ANYONE OR HIMSELF, AND REALITY WILL WARP AND ADAPT.

- The Ring also grants Cole the ability to teleport anywhere in the world, however, he must have a clear visual of the location he's trying to teleport so he'll be using GOOGLE EARTH a LOT!

- The ring's curse is to be mischievous and an experience for Cole. Cole himself is mischievous in nature so it fits.

- The ring won't work for anyone else except if a person is in a life of death experience and the ring saves that person. Cole will still be allowed to use it's power, as will the second person.

- The ring can change itself to one of many accessories depending on the type of person the character becomes. Limit this only to Rings, necklaces, and earrings, however keep it as a ring for the most part.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Characters:
Cole Lewis (25): The lead - Who lives with his sister Jade and cat Pepper. Chubby, dark curly long hair, goatee and wears glasses. Cole is immature, childish, but a hard worker at his office bank teller job.


Morgan Lewis (48): Cole's mother. Cannot walk, and travels in a wheelchair. Curvy body. Lives with her boyfriend Andrew and other daughter Sabrina in the country. Cole's father died years back. Very nosey, happy go lucky person and is just as childish and wild as Cole is.


Jade Lewis (15): Cole's sister. Lives with him because she didn't want to live out in the middle of nowhere with her mother. gothic appearance, very serious, orderly and tries to keep her brother in check. Very mature for her age. Very gothic fashionable and isn't suited for the country so she stayed. Very attached to Cole's cat Pepper


Andrew Richardson (40): Morgan's boyfriend. Works out in the farm with Morgan and Sabrina in Iowa. Very prideful, a hard worker. Is usually the victim of Morgan's childish antics but doesn't mind.


Sabrina Lewis (11): Morgan's youngest child and Cole's sister. Very curious and girly. Loves to ride horses on their farm out in the country.


Alyssa Kwan (24): Cole's childhood friend. Short, Asian, long black straight hair. Lives in New York but the two always keep in contact through phone calls and online. Lives with her parents in NY and younger brother Simon (9)


Nadia Miller (29): Probably Cole's number one costumer. She works as a model and resists Cole's charms for a long while.


Rachel Powell (38): Cole's Boss. Stunning, wealthy businesswoman. Wild red hair and wears librarian glasses (SEXY). Is single, and has been the victim of Cole's indirect flirts although it's pretty dangerous in the workplace.


Main Location Setting: Los Angeles California. Cole's large 3 room apartment.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Interactive Rules:

- This interactive will be heavily moderated. I will NOT accept short 1 paragraph chapters, and I reserve my rights to edit and delete as I see fit

- Do not rely on me to contribute for most of the time. Keep this interactive going readers. I'm extremely busy off and on.

- To keep this more as an interactive, only I will choose select chapters to have THE END pages when it comes to the character making a life or death decision in his life. However I won't make these type of stops for BOTH choices. There will be a few 'Right Decision/Wrong Decision' choices and only I will do these. Although don't expect to have every chapter end, probably just the contributions to this that I see, or when that part of the story has served it's purpose.

- Keep the transformations mainly to body switching and keep their experiences descriptive. When the characters are PERSON A, have them have their own bodies but will appear to everyone else as PERSON A and wear PA's clothes, accessories and hairstyles.

- Have good grammar, unintentional typos are OK.


- Have fun and enjoy

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
